title: The World God Only Knows 2 (Dub)
alternative_title: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai II; The World God Only Knows II; Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai 2; Kaminomi II; The World God Only Knows 2; 神のみぞ知るセカイ II
description: Katsuragi is back, and together with Elsie the hunt for loose souls continues on. This time however, they are joined by Elsie's friend and fellow Demon, Haqua.
